_xResult.title: Minding my own business blue trouser
_xResult.shortdesc: Minding my own business blue trouser
_xResult.longdesc:
Ready to conquer the world in blue formal trousers. This comfort fit low waist trouser with detachable suspenders gets you going through 9-5. Medium weight crepe fabric is super durable has some stretch and gives a sleek look. Looks best with a white shirt. Our favourite feature- the added detachable suspenders which you can war according to your mood and the straight tapered finish that accentuates your bottoms.

You can customise the length of the pant and also provide the desired length you want. Change the silhouette into tapered, flared or bootleg. Colour variations available in blue black and red.
